notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: Z.Z., Y.L. and H.K. designed the project; Z.Z., Y.L., H.K., N.P., H.X., W.A., S.J. and S.X. performed fieldwork and sampling; Z.Z. wrote the paper; Z.Z.,Y.L., H.K., M.J.B., A.J.N., H.X., S.J. and Q.Z. revised the paper; All authors discussed the results and provided input on the manuscript.
